标签页 Tabs

只能用来展示的日历，丑是丑了点，凑合下吧

基础

演示
当前tab: 1
标签页1
标签页2
标签页3
标签页4
内容,biubiu1
vue文件
<script setup>
import { LeeTabs, LeeTabPanel } from "lee-vue3-components";
import { ref } from "vue";

const tabIndex = ref('1')
</script>

<template>
  <div style="height: 100px;">
    <div>当前tab: {{ tabIndex }}</div>
    <LeeTabs v-model:value="tabIndex">
      <LeeTabPanel name="标签页1" tab-key="1">
        内容,biubiu1
      </LeeTabPanel>
      <LeeTabPanel name="标签页2" tab-key="2">
        内容,biubiu2
      </LeeTabPanel>
      <LeeTabPanel name="标签页3" tab-key="3">
        内容,biubiu3
      </LeeTabPanel>
      <LeeTabPanel name="标签页4" tab-key="4">
        内容,biubiu4
      </LeeTabPanel>
    </LeeTabs>
  </div>
</template>

无动画

演示
v-if展示内容
标签页1
标签页2
标签页3
标签页4
输入框测试
vue文件
<script setup>
import { LeeTabs, LeeTabPanel } from "lee-vue3-components";
import { ref } from "vue";

const tabIndex = ref('2')
</script>

<template>
  <div>
    <div>v-if展示内容</div>
    <LeeTabs :animated="false" v-model:value="tabIndex">
      <LeeTabPanel name="标签页1" tab-key="1">
        内容,biubiu1
      </LeeTabPanel>
      <LeeTabPanel name="标签页2" tab-key="2">
        输入框测试<input type="text">
      </LeeTabPanel>
      <LeeTabPanel name="标签页3" tab-key="3">
        内容,biubiu3
      </LeeTabPanel>
      <LeeTabPanel name="标签页4" tab-key="4">
        输入框测试2<input type="text">
      </LeeTabPanel>
    </LeeTabs>
  </div>
</template>

显示方式

演示
v-show展示内容
标签页1
标签页2
标签页3
标签页4
输入框测试
vue文件
<script setup>
import { LeeTabs, LeeTabPanel } from "lee-vue3-components";
import { ref } from "vue";

const tabIndex = ref('2')
</script>

<template>
  <div>
    <div>v-show展示内容</div>
    <LeeTabs :animated="false" v-model:value="tabIndex">
      <LeeTabPanel name="标签页1" tab-key="1">
        内容,biubiu1
      </LeeTabPanel>
      <LeeTabPanel name="标签页2" tab-key="2" display-type="show">
        输入框测试<input type="text">
      </LeeTabPanel>
      <LeeTabPanel name="标签页3" tab-key="3">
        内容,biubiu3
      </LeeTabPanel>
      <LeeTabPanel name="标签页4" tab-key="4">
        输入框测试2<input type="text">
      </LeeTabPanel>
    </LeeTabs>
  </div>
</template>

API

Tabs props

名称类型默认值说明
valuestring | numberundefined标签页当前值
animatedbooleantrue是否展示标签页切换动画

TabPanel props

名称类型默认值说明
displayType'if' | 'show'if标签内容展示形式
tabKeystring | numberundefined每个标签唯一的key
namestring''标签展示名称
